text: oh inu ana a Adamu! Musalole Satana kuti akunyengeni inu monga momwe anawatulutsitsa makolo anu ku Paradiso, kuwavula nsalu zawo ndi kuwaonetsa maliseche awo. Ndithudi iye pamodzi ndi gulu lake, amakuonani inu kuchokera kumalo amene inu simungathe kuwaona. Ndithudi Ife tidawapanga a Satana kukhala othandiza anthu osakhulupirira
